t: Amazon.com: Radial BT-Pro Bluetooth Direct Box : Musical Instruments
s: Radial, I am sorely disappointed in your judgement. Actually, maybe I am going to return these. I don't think I can hand them to a casual user without a raft of warnings and that reflects poorly on my intelligence in owning these. So back they go.... ... Bluetooth audio stutters & looses connection even 2 feet away from device. Sent out unit to manufacturer, came back with same poor performance. Used Apple, Samsung & other brand ...
